data.title: Movies with screenplay written by Leo Benvenuti And Steve Rudnick
data.meta_description: On Reelviews you can find extended reviews and ratings for movies with screenplay written by Leo Benvenuti And Steve Rudnick, including thoughts on the world of cinematography by James Berardinelli.
data.text:
Santa Clause, The

This is what happens when someone takes what might have been a moderately-entertaining television Christmas special and tries to adapt it for the big screen. The Santa Clause isn't an unmitigated disaster, but it's also a whole lot less impres...
